STORY AND RATINGS

Story

The film ‘Daredevil Musthafa’ is based on K.P Poornachandra Tejaswi’s short story with the same name. In a first of its kind attempt, 100+ fans of the writer have come forward to produce this film.

Ratings

8.1/10

IMDb

TRIVIA

Trivia

Daredevil Musthafa is comedy drama movie revolving around entry level college going students and struggles of Musthafa as a lone Muslim student in a Hindu college and the usual tensions and anecdotes trying to be one among them. The story is based on famous Novelist K.P. Poornachandra Tejasvi's writing Abachurina Postoffice.
